https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yHIrhCnG3PdlasQvKtLVTC5G5gb.jpg Raulhac, Cantal, France, September 1, 1905. In the forest surrounding his hometown, the young seminarian Bruno Reidal murders a child and then surrenders himself to the authorities. Bruno Reidal: Confession of a Murderer
